question: Which country houses "Sof Omar Caves"?
explanation: Sof Omar Caves is a cave of religious significance located in the Bale Province of Ethiopia. It is the longest cave in Ethiopia. It is also claimed as the longest cave system in Africa. It is situated through which Weyib River flows. This cave is sacred to both Islam and local Oromo traditional religion. The main attraction of this cave is its "Chamber Of Columns".
